Name: Jigsaw Pieces 2 - Shades of Mood
About the game: Making jigsaw puzzles makes you happy! Making jigsaw puzzles is a popular way to relax. Forming a harmonious whole of all loose puzzle pieces makes you forget about everyday stress. To make sure that even the last bit of stress will disappear, all puzzles in this beautiful game consist of comforting and uplifting images. Surround yourself with bright sunshine, warmth and inspiration and just feel happy! Since you make these jigsaw puzzles on your computer, you won’t be distracted by lack of space. Now nothing stands in the way of a relaxed feeling! Complete a huge amount of jigsaw puzzles in HD quality and adjust the difficulty, the form, the size and the style of the puzzle pieces easily to your preferences. It’s also up to you to determine the amount of puzzle pieces. Keep it simple or pick a puzzle with no less than 1000 pieces! Choose from 16 intriguing game modes, complete seven chapters and find a way to unlock the secret chapter. Listen to the relaxing soundtrack, enjoy the beautiful sunny pictures and turn completing jigsaw puzzles into a daily ritual! 7 Chapters + the Secret One Increase the size of a puzzle up to 1000 pieces Different cut-out patterns+ Mosaic and Lacy cut-outs 16 intriguing game modes Customizable difficulty: from relaxing to challenging Customizable Brightness and Colouring HD quality levels Great rewards every day New Hint System Interesting Random Puzzles of the day Relaxing soundtrack Set your most beloved levels as HD desktop wallpapers
